member.summary: Representation of a single walk area for a room. The walk area is stored to disk as a image mask, and then loaded and converted to a Dictionary of pathfinder nodes.

member.summary: Initializes a new instane of the class.

The height of the image mask this instance loaded from.
The nodes this instance was loaded from.

member.summary: Gets the width of the image mask this instance was loaded from.

member.summary: Gets the height of the image mask this instance loaded from.

member.name: P:LateStartStudio.Hero6.Engine.Campaigns.Rooms.Regions.WalkArea.Nodes
member.summary: Gets the nodes this instance was loaded from.

member.name: P:LateStartStudio.Hero6.Engine.Campaigns.Rooms.Regions.WalkArea.OpenSetCapacity
member.summary: Gets the capacity of the open set in the pathfinder. We assume that maximum number of nodes that can be visited is the same as the amount of nodes that can be legally traversed.

member.name: M:LateStartStudio.Hero6.Engine.Campaigns.Rooms.Regions.WalkArea.GetPath(System.Drawing.Point,System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: Gets the path from start to end.
member.returns: The path from start to end if it exists, null if else.

member.name: M:LateStartStudio.Hero6.Engine.Campaigns.Rooms.Regions.WalkArea.FindNeighborDistance(LateStartStudio.Search.Pathfinder.Node,LateStartStudio.Search.Pathfinder.Node)
member.summary: The distance between neighbors. We assume that the distance is equal reagardless of horizontal, vertical or diagonal positioning. Since there is no difference between the situations the value becomes irrelevant and we can just return a zero.

member.name: M:LateStartStudio.Hero6.Engine.Campaigns.Rooms.Regions.WalkArea.CalculateOctileHeuristic(LateStartStudio.Search.Pathfinder.Node,LateStartStudio.Search.Pathfinder.Node)
member.summary: Octile heuristic is a textbook example of how to calculate distances from nodes when we only move to neighbors at 45 degree angles. Top-Left, Top, Top-Right, etc.
